title: Refactor: Remove AtomWrapper/ResidueWrapper, use indices directly
description:
Current: AtomWrapper/ResidueWrapper provide persistent interface over pdbstruct's transient proxies.
Problem: Extra indirection layer adds complexity and performance overhead.
Goal: Use atom_idx/res_idx directly with pdbstruct proxies, eliminate wrapper classes.

Benefits:
- Simpler code (remove 200+ lines)
- Better performance (fewer object allocations)
- More direct pdbstruct API usage
- Easier to maintain

Approach:
- Replace wrapper objects with indices throughout
- Access proxies directly: soup.get_atom_proxy(idx)
- Store metadata in RenderedSoup dicts (already exists)
- Update Bond class to store indices instead of wrappers
